title: Get an iPad Air bundled with Beats Flex Headphones for just $115
content:
Macworld

If you like mobile tech but wish it wasn’t so expensive, then this is an offer you should definitely pay attention to. That’s because you can pick up an Apple iPad Air and a set of Beats Flex Headphones (both refurbished) for a bundle price that’s well below the original value.

Included in this bundle is a refurbished Grade ‘A’ iPad Air which comes equipped with a 9.7” Retina display, an A7 chip for fast processing, and 16GB of RAM — Perfect for fun, light-duty use.

Also: this AI-assisted drone, on sale for just $150, can be paired to iOS devices for even more fun.

Then, along with the iPad, you’ll also receive a set of Beats Flex Headphones so you can listen to your music on the go. Though these are also professionally renewed, they’ve been tested and cleaned to ensure they work just like they’re minty fresh from the factory. And they even come in their original packaging too.

Electronic devices aren’t always expensive — if you know where to find savings, that is. Which is one reason why refurbished units have become so popular. They allow you to enjoy the convenience that these devices offer, but you can save a ton so they won’t put nearly as big of a dent into your wallet.

Get the Apple iPad Air Bundle with Beats Flex Headphones (refurbished) for just $114.99.
